original_title: Brian Ceballo vs. Luis Alberto Veron
overview: Broadway Boxing comes to you live from New York, local fighter Brian Ceballo (13-1) takes on Luis Alberto Veron (20-6-2) in an eight-round contest. The card also sees Tsendbaatar Erdenebat (5-0) up against Edy Valencia Mercado (20-9-6).
title: Brian Ceballo vs. Luis Alberto Veron
